full_text: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-K DATE: 08/08/2019 TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE TIME FRAME TIME START TIME END SIGNATURE 12:00-12:30 AM 12:30- 1:00 AM 1:00-1:30 AM 1:30-2:00 AM 2:00-2:30 AM 2:30-3:00 AM 3:00-3:30 AM 3:30-4:00 AM 4:00-4:30 AM 4:30-5:00 AM 5:00 -5:30 AM 5:30-6:00 AM 6:00-6:30 AM 6:30-7:00 AM 7:00-7:30 AM 7:30-8:00 AM 8:00-8:30 AM 8:30- 9:00 AM 9:00-9:30 AM 9:30-10:00 AM 10:00-10:30 AM 10:30-11:00 AM 11:00-11:30 AM 11:30-12:00 AM 12:00-12:30 PM 12:30- 1:00 PM 1:00-1:30 PM 1:30-2:00 PM 2:00-2:30 PM 2:30-3:00 PM 3:00-3:30 PM 3:30-4:00 PM 4:00-4:30 PM 4:30-5:00 PM 5:00 -5:30 PM 5:30-6:00 PM 6:00-6:30 PM 6:30-7:00 PM 7:00-7:30 PM 7:30-8:00 PM 8:00-8:30 PM 8:30- 9:00 PM 9:00-9:30 PM 9:30-10:00 PM 10:00-10:30 PM 10:30-11:00 PM 11:00-11:30 PM 11:30-12:00 PM 12 13 14 152 153 218 219 235 236 307 309 334 335 422 423 443 444 507 509 537 540 622 623 635 651 703 703 734 734 b(6); b(7)(C) 833 842 909 910 928 931 1010 1011 1039 1040 1108 1107 1140 1142 1216 1218 1230 1231 101 102 133 154 205 206 287 238 301 310 311 b(6); b(7)(C) 704 704 433 433 504 504 535 535 602 602 633 633 702 702 733 733 803 804 833 834 904 904 935 939 1003 1004 1033 1034 1105 1105 1135 1135 b(6); b(7)(C) MORNING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT DAY WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT EVENING WATCH OPERATIONS LIEUTENANT A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented. REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN b(6); b(7)(C)

text_blocks.content: MCC NEW YORK SPECIAL HOUSING UNIT 30 MINUTE CHECK SHEET ZA TIER-K DATE: 08/08/2019
Various times and signatures throughout the table

A staff member must observe all inmates confined in a continuous locked down status, such as administrative detention or disciplinary segregation, at least once in the first 30 minute period of the hour (example, 12:00 a.m. - 12:30 a.m.) followed by another round in the second 30 minutes period of the same hour (example, 12:30 am - 1:00 a.m.), thus ensuring an inmate is observed at least twice per hour. These rounds are to be conducted on an irregular schedule and no more than 40 minutes apart. All observations must be documented.
REVIEWED BY MORNING WATCH LIEUTENANT CAPTAIN

additional_notes: The document contains handwritten times and signatures in a table format, with some redacted information marked as 'b(6); b(7)(C)'. The document is a 30-minute check sheet for inmates in a special housing unit.
